comments:
Create a new extended report item, such as the example RotatedTextItem.

It appears in the palette, as expected.

Try to drag it into the library. 
Expected behavior: This is possible.
Actual behavior: It is forbidden.

The mechanism for supporting export to a library should be automatic, like the
inclusion in the palette.

The extended element DND supports by GUI.
This feature is that the extended item don't has default name. 
Throw following exception:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: The name parameter must not be empty since report item extension doesn't provides default extension element name.

Model should use name in extension point as the default name.

Any element in the library must have names. Model can create default name for extended report item. But extension plugin.xml must provide extended report item displayNameID. See this example from chart:

<reportItem             class="org.eclipse.birt.chart.reportitem.ChartReportItemFactoryImpl"
 isNameRequired="true"
 displayNameID="Element.Chart"
 extensionName="Chart">

displayNameID="Element.Chart" is required. Not optional in this case.
When creates default names for extension elements, uses displayNameID firstly. If the i18n resource of displayNameID is not found, uses extensionName.

traces.message: The name parameter must not be empty since report item extension doesn't provides default extension element name.
